meanings.definition: Covered with a thin layer of chromium.
meanings.sent1: The shiny car was chromed, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The chromed faucet sparkled in the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The chromed bicycle looked like a mirror on wheels.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a chromed surface.
meanings.sent5: The chromed rims on the car made it stand out on the road.

meanings.definition: To plate or coat with chromium.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic chromed the rims of the car for a sleek look.
meanings.sent2: She chromed the metal parts to prevent rusting.
meanings.sent3: He chromed his phone case for a futuristic touch.
meanings.sent4: The artist chromed the sculpture to give it a metallic sheen.
meanings.sent5: They chromed the doorknob to match the rest of the hardware.
